# Java 17 Migration Summary

## Overview
This document summarizes the changes made to migrate the contargo-types project from Java 8 to Java 17.

## Changes Made

### 1. POM.xml Updates

#### Java Version Properties
- Updated `jdk.version` from `1.8` to `17`
- Added `maven.compiler.source` property set to `17`
- Added `maven.compiler.target` property set to `17`

#### Dependency Updates
The following dependencies were updated to Java 17 compatible versions:

| Dependency | Old Version | New Version | Notes |
|------------|-------------|-------------|-------|
| javax.validation:validation-api | 2.0.1.Final | jakarta.validation:jakarta.validation-api 3.0.2 | Migrated to Jakarta EE |
| com.googlecode.libphonenumber:libphonenumber | 8.8.7 | 8.13.26 | Updated to latest |
| commons-lang:commons-lang | 2.6 | org.apache.commons:commons-lang3 3.14.0 | Migrated to commons-lang3 |
| org.slf4j:slf4j-api | 1.7.25 | 2.0.16 | Updated to SLF4J 2.x |
| junit:junit | 4.13.1 | 4.13.2 | Security patch update |
| org.hibernate:hibernate-validator | 5.3.6.Final | org.hibernate.validator:hibernate-validator 8.0.1.Final | Migrated to Jakarta EE |
| org.mockito:mockito-core | 1.10.19 | 5.13.0 | Major version upgrade |

#### Additional Dependencies
- Added `org.glassfish.expressly:expressly:5.0.0` (required for Hibernate Validator 8.x)

#### Maven Plugin Updates
| Plugin | Old Version | New Version |
|--------|-------------|-------------|
| maven-compiler-plugin | 3.5.1 | 3.11.0 |
| maven-source-plugin | 3.0.0 | 3.3.0 |
| maven-javadoc-plugin | 2.10.3 | 3.6.3 |
| maven-surefire-plugin | N/A | 3.2.5 |

#### Maven Compiler Plugin Configuration
- Added `<release>${jdk.version}</release>` configuration
- Ensures proper Java 17 compilation with module system compatibility

### 2. Source Code Updates

#### Package Namespace Changes
All occurrences of `javax.validation` were replaced with `jakarta.validation`:
- `javax.validation.Constraint` → `jakarta.validation.Constraint`
- `javax.validation.ConstraintValidator` → `jakarta.validation.ConstraintValidator`
- `javax.validation.ConstraintValidatorContext` → `jakarta.validation.ConstraintValidatorContext`
- `javax.validation.Payload` → `jakarta.validation.Payload`
- And other javax.validation.* imports

#### Commons Lang Migration
All occurrences of `org.apache.commons.lang` were replaced with `org.apache.commons.lang3`:
- Updated imports in all affected Java files
- No API changes required as methods are compatible

#### Mockito API Updates
Updated test code to use Mockito 5.x API:
- `org.mockito.runners.MockitoJUnitRunner` → `org.mockito.junit.MockitoJUnitRunner`
- `org.mockito.Matchers.*` → `org.mockito.ArgumentMatchers.*`

### 3. Files Modified

#### Main Source Files
The following files had their imports updated:
- Container validation classes
- Telephony validation classes
- Contact info validation classes
- All classes using commons-lang

#### Test Files
All test files using Mockito were updated with new import statements.

## Verification

The migration was verified successfully:
- ✅ All 44 source files compile without errors
- ✅ All 27 test files compile without errors
- ✅ All 272 tests pass (0 failures, 0 errors)
- ✅ `mvn clean verify` completes successfully with Java 17

## Notes

1. The migration from javax.* to jakarta.* is required for Java 17+ as Oracle transferred Java EE to the Eclipse Foundation, which renamed it to Jakarta EE.

2. Commons-lang 2.x is no longer maintained and has been superseded by commons-lang3, which is fully compatible with Java 17.

3. Mockito 1.x is incompatible with Java 17, hence the upgrade to Mockito 5.x. The API changes are minimal and mainly involve import statements.

4. SLF4J 2.x is required for Java 17 compatibility and provides better performance and features.

5. Some javadoc warnings are present but do not affect compilation or runtime behavior.

## Compatibility

The migrated codebase is now compatible with:
- Java 17 (tested with OpenJDK 17.0.17)
- Jakarta EE 9+
- Modern Maven build tools
- Latest versions of testing frameworks

## Build Commands

To build the project:
```bash
mvn clean install
```

To run tests:
```bash
mvn clean verify
```

To skip tests:
```bash
mvn clean install -DskipTests
```
